content: you fasten all the tails left leave some to 4 for the sleeves work double_crochet instead of tie the dress alternatively you could add some popcorn stitches small buttons she s so pretty in her pink dress 19 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs bow hook 2 0 work normally work with light blue yarn this part is worked in row row1 chain 11 10 row2 10 single_crochet 10 tch turn in the following row the turning chain substitutes the first st of the row so you must work in it the row after notice how this makes the edges smoother row3-row19 skip 1 st 9 single_crochet 10 tch turn cy-poat the very end using the tapestry needle tie the middle of the stripe prepare a separates stripe made of chain 10 9 single_crochet and tie it around the middle of the bow 20 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs the bow is ready i use a bobby pin to easily take it on and off her head congratulations your little mermaid is ready so pretty in all her outfits don t forget to send me a picture and tag me / give me credits / use my hashtag when posting online all info is in the license 21
